name.description: The name of the client (string, required, unique in workspace)

notes.description: Notes for the client (string, not required)

hrate.description: The hourly rate for this client (float, not required, available only for pro workspaces)

cur.description: The name of the client's currency (string, not required, available only for pro workspaces)

name.description: The name of the client (string, not required, unique in workspace)

notes.description: Notes for the client (string, not required)

hrate.description: The hourly rate for this client (float, not required, available only for pro workspaces)

cur.description: The name of the client's currency (string, not required, available only for pro workspaces)

ArchiveClient.summary: Archives a workspace client and related projects. Only for premium workspaces.

RestoreClient.summary: Restores client and all related or specified projects from the given workspace.

projects.description: Array of project IDs to restore.

GetClientProjects._todo: This is defined in the v8 docs https://github.com/toggl/toggl_api_docs/blob/master/chapters/clients.md#get-client-projects but not in the v9 docs or the migration guide.

name.description: The name of the project (string, required, unique for client and workspace)

end_date.description: End date of a project timeframe

start_date.description: Start date of a project timeframe

active.description: whether the project is archived or not (boolean, by default true)

auto_estimates.description: Whether estimates are based on task hours, optional, premium feature

billable.description: Whether the project is set as billable, optional, premium feature

fixed_fee.description: Project fixed fee, optional, premium feature

is_private.description: whether project is accessible for only project users or for all workspace users (boolean, default true)

rate_change_mode.description: Rate change mode, optional, premium feature. Can be "start-today", "override-current", "override-all"

template.description: whether the project can be used as a template (boolean, not required)

template_id.description: id of the template project used on current project's creation

active.description: possible values true/false/both. By default true. If false, only archived projects are returned.

since.description: Retrieve projects created/modified/deleted since this date using UNIX timestamp.

GetProjectTasks.summary: Get project tasks for given workspace.

active.description: Whether the project is active or archived (boolean, by default true)

auto_estimates.description: Whether estimates are based on task hours, optional, premium feature

billable.description: Whether the project is set as billable, optional, premium feature

end_date.description: End date of a project timeframe

fixed_fee.description: Project fixed fee, optional, premium feature

is_private.description: whether project is accessible for only project users or for all workspace users (boolean, default true)

name.description: The name of the project (string, required, unique for client and workspace)

rate_change_mode.description: Rate change mode, optional, premium feature. Can be "start-today", "override-current", "override-all"

recurring.description: Project is recurring, optional, premium feature

recurring_parameters.description: Project recurring parameters, optional, premium feature

custom_period.description: Recurring custom period, the "period" field must be "custom"

start_date.description: Start date of a project timeframe

template.description: whether the project can be used as a template (boolean, not required)

template_id.description: id of the template project used on current project's creation

manager.description: admin rights for this project (boolean, default false)

rate.description: hourly rate for the project user (float, not-required, only for pro workspaces) in the currency of the project's client or in workspace default currency.

name.description: The name of the tag (string, required, unique in workspace)

workspace_id.description: workspace ID, where the tag will be used (integer, required)

workspace_id.description: workspace ID, where the tag will be used (integer, required)

name.description: The name of the task (string, required, unique in project)

pid.description: project ID for the task (integer, required)

uid.description: user ID, to whom the task is assigned to (integer, not required)

estimated_seconds.description: estimated duration of task in seconds (integer, not required)

active.description: whether the task is done or not (boolean, by default true)

UpdateTask.summary: Update project task for given workspace.

name.description: The name of the task (string, not required, unique in project)

uid.description: user ID, to whom the task is assigned to (integer, not required)

estimated_seconds.description: estimated duration of task in seconds (integer, not required)

active.description: whether the task is done or not (boolean, by default true)

DeleteTask.summary: Delete projects task for given workspace.

UpdateTasks.summary: Update project tasks for given workspace.

name.description: The name of the task (string, not required, unique in project)

uid.description: user ID, to whom the task is assigned to (integer, not required)

estimated_seconds.description: estimated duration of task in seconds (integer, not required)

active.description: whether the task is done or not (boolean, by default true)

billable.description: (boolean, not required, default false, available for pro workspaces)

created_with.description: the name of your client app (string, required)

tags.description: a list of tag names (array of strings, not required)

duronly.description: should Toggl show the start and stop time of this time entry? (boolean, not required)

start.description: start of time entry (string, required, ISO 8601 date and time)

wid.description: workspace ID (integer, required if pid or tid not supplied)

billable.description: (boolean, not required, default false, available for pro workspaces)

created_with.description: the name of your client app (string, not required)

tags.description: a list of tag names (array of strings, not required)

duration.description: duration of time entry (integer, not required)

duronly.description: should Toggl show the start and stop time of this time entry? (boolean, not required)

start.description: start of time entry (string, not required, ISO 8601 date and time)

GetTimeEntries.summary: Get time entries started in a specific time range.If start_date and end_date are not specified, time entries started during the last 9 days are returned.

since.description: Get entries modified since this date using UNIX timestamp, including deleted ones.

before.description: Get entries with start time, before given date (YYYY-MM-DD) or with time in RFC3339 format.

start_date.description: Get entries with start time, from start_date YYYY-MM-DD or with time in RFC3339 format. To be used with end_date.

end_date.description: Get entries with start time, until end_date YYYY-MM-DD or with time in RFC3339 format. To be used with start_date.

GetCurrentUser.summary: Returns details for the current user.

with_related_data.description: Retrieve user related data (clients, projects, tasks, tags, workspaces, time entries, etc.)

CreateUser.summary: Sign up as a new user.

code.description: The code you received from the OAuth authorization step. (string, required). Required if signing up via OAuth.

country_id.description: User's country ID, if not provided will be United States

created_with.description: Should describe the application/service that is using the API

email.description: a valid email for the user whose account is created (string, required)

full_name.description: User's full name, if not provided will be derived from the email address

invitation_code.description: Optional, used when creating account through an invitation

password.description: password at least 6 characters long (string, required)

provider.description: Required if signing up via OAuth

timezone.description: User's timezone, if not provided will be UTC

token.description: Whether the Terms of Service have been accepted

tos_accepted.description: Whether the Terms of Service have been accepted

workspace.description: Optional workspace settings, used when creating account not through an invitation

initial_pricing_plan.description: Plan ID for the new workspace

initial_trial.description: New workspace should be created with a trial subscription? (only for stage)

name.description: Workspace name, if not provided it will be based on the user's full name

GetGroups.summary: Returns list of groups in organization based on set of url parameters. List is sorted by name.

GetWorkspaceUsers.summary: List all users for a given workspace.

GetWorkspaceWorkspaceUsers.summary: Returns any users who belong to the workspace directly or through at least one group.

UpdateWorkspaceUser.summary: Update the data for a workspace_user in a given workspace.

workspace_user_id.description: Numeric ID of the workspace user
Numeric ID of the workspace user.

AcceptInvitation.summary: User connected with invitation is marked as joined, email is sent to the inviter.

RejectInvitation.summary: User connected with invitation is marked as deleted.

CreateUserInvitation.summary: Creates a new invitation for the user.

items.description: The valid email of user who must be invite to this workspace (string, required)
The valid workspace of user who must be invite to this workspace (object, required)

admin.description: If true, the invited user will be workspace admin (boolean, required)

workspace_id.description: Numeric ID of the workspace (integer, required)
